title: Tunche -and- The Silent Age free from Epic Games Store
description:
Still waiting for a patch so you can play The Last of Us? Well, Epic has not one but two ways you can pass that time. Punch through the rainforest with Tunche or point and click through the pre-apocalyptic 70s with The Silent Age.

Tunche Link[store.epicgames.com]
The Silent Age Link[store.epicgames.com]

Details:

- Account/DRM required: Epic Games (NOT Steam)
- Offer good through April 6, 1400 GMT
- Tunche Steam store page for evaluation
- The Silent Age Steam store page for evaluation

Next week - Dying Light: Enhanced Edition -and- Blazing Sails

LH
Getting back to two a week. I like it!

title: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War free from Epic Games store
description:

Link[store.epicgames.com]

Details:
- Account/DRM required: Epic Games (NOT Steam)
- Offer good through March 23, 1400 GMT

UPDATE - Yes, it's Chess Ultra. And some sort of World of Warships DLC.
